sub_title: Financial consultant / Transition / Change Manager / Global finance processes RTR, PTP, OTC / Shared Service Center Manager - Internal controls - People management & Teams leadership (Freelancer).
summary:
Maximizing business performance by leading transition & governance functions in RTR, PTP, OTC and financial reporting. Building effective accounting policies & procedures to obtain desired standardised end-to-end processes. 
Instrumental in directing and managing cross-cultural finance teams in high-profile companies.
